titleStmt.title: Pirāṉmalai, X temple, time of X, year X

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

revisionDesc.change: Creation of the file on the repository

div.p:
(svasti śrī) kōmāṟa paṉmarāṉa tiripuvaṉac cakkara-vattikaḷ emmaṇṭala
ṇṭaruḷiya śrī kulacēkara tēvakku yāṇṭu 36 vatu vruścika nāyaṟ
ṟu pūrva pakṣattu daśamiyum cevvāyk kiḻamaiyum peṟṟa uttaraṭṭāti nāḷ maruṅkūr
nāṭṭu nāṭṭavarom tirumalai nāṭṭut tiruk koṭuṅ kuṉṟattu tiraṭṭap perun
teruvil virata muṭittāṉ tirumaṭattu vattikkum tiruvārūr tekṣiṇa goḷagi maṭattu ne
kkumācāriyar ḷil śrī kaliyāraḷaik kāmi devaṟku udaka pramāṇam paṇṇik kuṭutta paricāvatu iṉṉāṭṭu ū
maṉṉukuṟicciyil ivar eḻuṉtaruḷivitta uṭaiyār atika maḻakīśvaramuṭaiya nāyaṉār santadhiyil
(nā)ṅkaḷ camaittu kuṭutta maṭam maruṅkūr nāṭṭut tirumaṭameṉṟu pēriṭukaiyil iṉta maṭattukku
maṭapuṟamāka nāṅkaḷ kuṭutta iṉnāṭṭu tēvimaṅkalattu maruṅkūr nāṭṭup pērēri vayalukkup perunā
ṉ kellaiyāvatu kīḻpāṟ kellai kollaṉ kuḻikku mēṟkum teṉpāṟ kellai kaḷavūraṉ kālukku
vaṭakkum mēlpāṟ kellai kūr nāṭṭup pērēriyil nīr kōvaikku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟ kellai ūrma
ṉṉu kuṟicciyil niṉṟu kkut teṟku āka icainta peru nāṉk' ellaik kuṭpaṭṭa kuḷamuṅ kuḷa
paruppum naṉcey puṉcey tōṭṭamuṅ kīḻ nōkkiya kiṇaṟum mēlnōkkiya maramum maṟṟum eppē(rp)
paṭṭa samasta prāptikaḷum ivarkku maṭappuṟamāka udaka pramāṇam paṇṇi nāṭ ṭiṟaiyili yākak kuṭuttōm ikkuḷa
ttukku mu raṇṭu kuḷa nīr varuṅ kālukkum nīr pāyvatākavum ippaṭi sammadittu nāṉkellaikkun tiruccūlastā
panam paṇṇik kuṭuttom ippaṭi ikkuḷamum pramāṇam laperumāṉ kōṉum mu
ṉaintalaik kōṉu muḷḷiṭṭārkkum perunāṉ ṭaiyakkuṭi nīṅkā maṭa
puṟamāka nallūr kīḻu ūrppaccai mā
ttāliraṇṭu paṇamum
kavum tirumalaiyi –e
ttōm mutalil
ṇṭiya vēḷārum ma
kkirama pāṇṭiya vē
This edition by G. Vijayavenugopal (2022). Reviewed by Emmanuel Francis (2024), based on photos (N. Ramaswamy).
